tool_description: Analyzes whether selected bathroom fixtures are compatible with existing plumbing, electrical, and spatial constraints.

product_ids.description: List of product IDs to check compatibility for

existing_plumbing.description: Existing plumbing configuration: standard, custom, unknown

electrical_available.description: Whether electrical connections are available for powered fixtures

drain_locations.description: Existing drain locations in the bathroom

wall_type.description: Wall construction type: drywall, tile, concrete, wood

error_messages: Invalid bathroom dimensions: All dimensions must be positive numbers greater than 24 inches
Invalid plumbing configuration: Use one of [standard, custom, unknown]
Invalid wall type: Use one of [drywall, tile, concrete, wood]
Insufficient space: One or more fixtures exceed available bathroom dimensions
usage: Provide product_ids and complete bathroom measurements. Specify existing_plumbing type and electrical_available status for accurate compatibility assessment.

compatibility_status.description: Array of compatibility status for each product: compatible, requires_modification, incompatible

space_requirements.description: Array of space requirement descriptions for each product

modification_needed.description: Array of required modifications for each product if any

fit_score.description: Array of compatibility scores from 1-10 for each product
